name: Bario Entertainment System
description: Onchain indie video game marketplace where players can mint, own, and resell digital games as NFTs. Each sale automatically directs 90% of revenue to the game's creator, aligning incentives between developers and players. Publishing on the platform is permissionless, while discovery on baes.app is curated to ensure quality and safety. Tokenomics: the $BAES token was fair launched on Farcaster with no team allocation, and the team's current ~ 10% holding was accumulated through revenue. Initially used for tipping developers, the token is expanding to support tournaments, game purchases, tipping, and curation across the platform. It also connects to a Farcaster-based infofi layer, with a $BAES leaderboard mini app launching soon to showcase engagement and reputation.
